timeline.bodyText: This resolution dance, is this the only place where it needs to happen? No usage in UI for example?
timeline.author: aaime

replies.bodyText: No indeed it happens in the GetLegendGraphicKvpReader class. I change the code to use that method instead.
replies.author: taba90

timeline.bodyText: Hmm... LegendInfo is part of the catalog configuration, are we sure that it can be modified just like this without side effects? Is it wrapped in a ModificationProxy at runtime? If so, unless it gets saved, there are no problems, otherwise, best to clone it before changing it.
timeline.author: aaime

timeline.bodyText: GeoServer is prone to have dangling style references, best to filter out null styles in this loop.
timeline.author: aaime

timeline.bodyText: All this preparation is done to get the LegendInfo, right? If so, best to move it in a separate method, and just return the legend info, without cluttering this method with otherwise unused variables.
timeline.author: aaime
